name: Charge (itch) (mcstuber)
description:
Charge is a physics based 3d platformer - Use W, A, S, D to Roll , Left Mouse Button to use a positive charge to grow, and Right Mouse Button to use a negative charge to shrink. This game was made for GDL - July 2021 Jam. Theme is "Size matters". 

Escape to unlock cursor, Right-Click to lock cursor  (Menu button in game will bring you directly to the main menu and progress will not be saved.)
